mapper.select: select o.order_id, o.order_amount, o.order_date, c.worker_id,ci.item_id, i.item_name,ci.client_id from v3_order o, v3_client c , v3_client_items ci , V3_item i where o.client_id = c.client_id and c.client_id = ci.client_id and i.item_id = ci.item_id

SELECT DISTINCT o.order_id, o.order_num, o.order_payment_date, o.order_payment_duedate, o.order_receive_date, o.order_receive_duedate, o.order_amount, o.order_date, c.worker_id, o.item_id, w.department_id, w.worker_code
FROM v3_order o JOIN v3_client c ON o.client_id = c.client_id JOIN v3_worker w ON c.worker_id = w.worker_id JOIN v3_client_items ci ON o.client_id = ci.client_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO v3_order ( order_id, order_payment_date, order_payment_duedate, order_date, order_amount, order_receive_date, order_receive_duedate, worker_id, client_id, item_id ) VALUES ( #{order_id}, #{order_payment_day}, #{order_payment_duedate}, #{order_date}, #{order_amount}, #{order_receivement_date}, #{order_receive_duedate}, #{worker_id}, #{client_id}, #{item_id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE v3_order SET order_payment_date = #{order_payment_day}, order_payment_duedate = #{order_payment_duedate}, order_receive_date = #{order_receivement_date}, order_receive_duedate = #{order_receive_duedate}, order_amount = #{order_amount}, order_date = #{order_date}, worker_id = #{worker_id}, client_id = #{client_id}, item_id = #{item_id} WHERE order_id = #{order_id}
